text: “This is a legal regulation the Lord has ordered, saying, Tell the Israelites to bring you a red cow19:2. “Cow”: the word used here is usually translated as “heifer” which in English refers to a young female cow that has not had a calf. However, as is clear from 1 Samuel 6:7 the word is also used to describe a cow that has had a calf and is producing milk. without defects which has never been yoked.
